scenario.init: Machine is in normal operation; oil temperature is within the normal range and stable.
scenario.expected_result: Oil temperature remains within the specified limits with no unexpected increase.
scenario.instead_failure: Due to a defective cooler, oil temperature rises continuously at varying rates across runs until it exceeds the threshold; high‑temperature alarms are triggered.

diagnoses.name: Hydraulic oil cooler defective.
diagnoses.comment: Temperature in hydraulic oil rises above allowed operating range
